Rule.Name: Never use stderr or stdout
Rule.What: Using the Standard Output Stream or the Standard Error Output Stream (mainly for logging purpose) in application code is forbidden.
Rule.Why: When you run applications in production mode, you want to be able to turn on or off certain categories or level of logging informations.
